description.lang: The WO15EMZ5-1 Wall Mounted Outlet is a Tamper resistant grounded duplex receptacle that meets the 2008 NEC requirement and is easily wired in place of a standard wall outlet. A shutter mechanism inside the receptacle blocks access to the contacts unless a 2 prong plug is inserted. This Wall Mounted Outlet integrates with other Nortek Z-Wave enabled products, and also acts as a wireless repeater. This device supports Energy Monitoring.With Over The Air upgrading supported, this device can be seamlessly updated to the most recent firmware and software features.Finally, as a Z-Wave plus product, its 30% longer range is ideal for easily creating a strong Z-Wave mesh network for an easier installation and more reliable operation.
Number of minutes between automatic reporting
LED OFF when the load is on, and ON when the load is off
LED ON when the load is on, and OFF when the load is off
LED blinks during RF transmissions from or to the device
